item.description: Covariance Matrix 2021-10-29 Tags: #Matrix #Math/Statistics https://janakiev.com/blog/covariance-matrix/ Variance, Covariance Variance measures the variation of a single random variable (like height of a person in a population) $$\sigma_{x}^{2}=\mathbb E \left(\frac{1}{n-1} \sum_{i=1}^{n}\left(x_{i}-\bar{x}\right)^{2}\right)$$ Link: ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ–¹å·®çš„åˆ†æ¯å¸¸å¸¸æ˜¯n-1
